title: Fs/ft: T206 harry lumley psa 6, tough common!  *SOLD*

posts.post_title: Fs/ft: T206 harry lumley psa 6, tough common!  *SOLD*
posts.post_content: Piedmont 350 back, corners look like 8's. A recent sgc 60 sold on ebay for $159, and a recent sgc 84 sold for $700. Scans can be seen on ebay item #200746601120. This is a beautiful card, $255....thanks  CARD IS SOLD, THANKS BILL
